snippet.title: Seekers of Eclipse - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on steam now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2577850/Seekers_of_Eclipse/?utm_source=announceTrailer

Lead your people back to the homeland! To do that you need to make it in time for the Eclipse. Choose your leader and build towns to defeat obstacles in this roguelike city builder with deck building mechanics.
